scripts.create-document: f() { for file in src/*.json; do aws ssm create-document --name $(basename $file .json) --content file://$file --document-type Command --region $1 || :; done }; f
scripts.create-document-all-regions: for region in $(aws ec2 describe-regions --query 'Regions[].RegionName' --output text); do npm run create-document "$region"; done
scripts.publish-document: f() { for file in src/*.json; do aws ssm modify-document-permission --name $(basename $file .json) --permission-type Share --account-ids-to-add All --region $1 || :; done }; f
scripts.publish-document-all-regions: for region in $(aws ec2 describe-regions --query 'Regions[].RegionName' --output text); do npm run publish-document "$region"; done
scripts.update-document: f() { for file in src/*.json; do aws ssm update-document --name $(basename $file .json) --content file://$file --document-version \$LATEST --region $1 || :; done }; f
scripts.update-document-default-version: f() { for file in src/*.json; do aws ssm update-document-default-version --name $(basename $file .json) --document-version $(aws ssm describe-document --name $(basename $file .json) --query 'Document.LatestVersion' --output text --region $1) --region $1 || :; done }; f
scripts.update-document-all-regions: for region in $(aws ec2 describe-regions --query 'Regions[].RegionName' --output text); do npm run update-document "$region"; done
scripts.update-document-default-version-all-regi: for region in $(aws ec2 describe-regions --query 'Regions[].RegionName' --output text); do npm run update-document-default-version "$region"; done
